title.narrative: EVIDENCE GENERATION (PFM, SOCIAL PROTECTION)

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Reducing Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: South Sudan increasingly implements child-sensitive policies and social protection programmes

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF GENDER CHILD AND SOCIAL WELFARE

sector.narrative: Child poverty public advocacy (media and social media, campaigns)
Local governance related (national subnational, local) policies programmes, plans and/or budgets
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: New Element

description.narrative: With UNICEF’s support, strategic evidence on budgets including national and sectoral Budget Briefs, Citizens’ Budgets, and the 2019 OBS were used to advocate for budget allocations for child outcomes and budget transparency. UNICEF and UNDP continued to implement the JP, with more than half of the JP activities implemented in 2021.;State Transfer Monitoring Committee and the County Transfer Monitoring Committees were re-established, and the PFM Dashboard was developed. Collectively, these results advanced PFM advocacy on budget allocations and execution for social services. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:11/01/2022

title.narrative: Strengthened capacity of stakeholders in budgeting at all levels of government to improve spending outcomes for children, Text

baseline.value: Scale 1 -UNICEF is working on strengthening capacities of stakeholders to improve spending outcomes for children

target.value: 2022:Scale 3 -Country has improved spending outcomes for children as a result of strengthened capacities of key stakeholders

actual.value: 2021:Score 2 - UNICEF has improved capacities of stakeholders for improved spending outcomes
